lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.

In an attempt to win the heart of your latest love, you decide to write him a poem that will melt his very soul. You labor for hours, and then get ready to mail him the product of your endeavor.  You review it one last time.
And blows through your blond hair...
You must be soft and cuddly...
He's extremely flattered. To show you his appreciation, he buys you a dozen roses.
He thinks the poem is corny and avoids you.
